nodes.text: Samoc Farr was a female pilot that served in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. She was the younger sister of Toryn Farr and participated in the Battle of Hoth with Rogue Squadron.

Samoc Farr joined the rebellion at a young age with her sister Toryn and both excelled in their chosen areas of expertise. While her sister became a chief communications officer, younger Samoc, three years her junior, became a pilot.

After the Rebel Alliance relocated to Hoth during the Galactic Civil War, Samoc Farr was tasked with flying snowspeeder patrols around Echo Base. She later participated in the Battle of Hoth with Rogue Squadron under the callsign Rogue Six, when their hidden base was attacked by the Galactic Empire, but was shot down and suffered a worrisome burn. She was later found by her sister Toryn, on a stretcher in the Echo Base hangar, along with other injured pilots. Her burn was already slathered in bacta. Both managed to evacuate on the last transport, Bright Hope.
